mapper.select: select b.bcontact_no,bt.type,b.contact,b.bcontact_type_no from Bcontact b inner join Bcontact_Type bt on b.bcontact_type_no = bt.bcontact_type_no where bmember_id = #{id} order by bcontact_no
mapper.update: update Bcontact set bcontact_type_no = #{bcontact_type_no} , contact = #{contact} where bcontact_no = #{bcontact_no}
